SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ButtonTypeAdapter
The ButtonTypeAdapter class is a Gson TypeAdapter for serializing and deserializing Button objects.
CardFactory
The CardFactory class is responsible for creating and managing DragonCards.
Cave
The Cave class represents a cave in the game, with properties such as its position, the creature occupying it, and the player occupying it.
CircleTypeAdapter
The CircleTypeAdapter class is a Gson TypeAdapter for serializing and deserializing Circle objects.
ColorTypeAdapter
The ColorTypeAdapter class is a Gson TypeAdapter for serializing and deserializing Color objects.
CreatureName
Defines the enum for Creature Names with associated colors.
DragonCardHandler
Handles the logic for assigning creatures to dragon card buttons in the game.
DragonCards
The DragonCards class represents a card in the game, with properties such as the creature type and the quantity associated with the card.
DragonClassAdapter
The DragonClassAdapter class is a Gson TypeAdapter for serializing and deserializing Button objects.
Game
The Game class represents the core logic of the Fiery Dragons game.
GUI
The GUI class is responsible for launching the graphical user interface (GUI) of the application.
ImageViewTypeAdapter
The ImageViewTypeAdapter class is a Gson TypeAdapter for serializing and deserializing ImageView objects.
LoadingHandler
The LoadingHandler class handles loading game data from a JSON file.
MainApp
The MainApp class serves as the entry point for launching the application.
MainAppController
The MainAppController class manages the main gameplay functionality and UI of the Fiery Dragons game.
MainMenuController
The MainMenuController class handles the actions performed in the main menu of the game.
MovementHandler
The MovementHandler class manages the movement logic in the game.
Player
The Player class represents a player in the game, holding information about their position, token, and various game states.
PlayerChangeListener
The PlayerChangeListener interface should be implemented by classes that wish to receive notifications when the player changes in the game.
PlayerDeserializer
The PlayerDeserializer class deserializes JSON into a Player object.
SavingHandler
The SavingHandler class handles the saving of game data to a JSON file.
TimerChangeListener
The TimerChangeListener interface should be implemented by classes that wish to receive notifications when the timer changes in the game.
TutorialController
The TutorialController class manages the tutorial view in the application, providing functionality to display tutorial images and navigate back to the main menu.
VictoryHandler
The VictoryHandler class is responsible for handling victory conditions in the game.
VolcanoCardHandler
The VolcanoCardHandler class is responsible for assigning creatures to volcano cards.
WinnerPageController
The WinnerPageController class manages the winner page in the game, providing functionality to set the winner, navigate back to the main menu, and start a new game.
